section.title: TMXFuelIRT4M8T.cc
section.programlisting: 00001 00002 // \brief Implementation of the TMXFuelIRT4M8T class 00003 // 00004 // 00006 // 00007 // TMXFuelIRT4M8T 00008 // 00009 // Donovan Maire, Thomas Frosio, Transmutex, 07/09/2020 00010 // 00012 // Class to manage the different fuel types 00014 00015 00016 // TMX Class 00017 #include "TMXInputParameters.hh" 00018 #include "TMXFuelIRT4M8T.hh" 00019 #include "TMXMaterial.hh" 00020 00021 // GEANT4 libraries 00022 #include "G4Material.hh" 00023 #include "G4LogicalVolume.hh" 00024 #include "G4NistManager.hh" 00025 #include "G4PVPlacement.hh" 00026 00027 00028 // C++ libraries 00029 #include <vector> 00030 #include <string> 00031 00032 static G4String fuelType = "IRT4M8T"; 00033 00034 TMXFuelIRT4M8T::TMXFuelIRT4M8T(const std::string& FuelAssemblyName, TMXInputParameters* parameter, G4double rodInsertion ): 00035 TMXAbstractFuelAssembly(FuelAssemblyName, parameter, rodInsertion) 00036 { 00037 createMaterial(); 00038 createGeometry(); 00039 } 00040 00041 00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------*------------------------------------------------------------------------------// 00043 // Construction of the material compositions 00044 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------*------------------------------------------------------------------------------// 00045 void TMXFuelIRT4M8T::createMaterial() 00046 { 00047 G4double temperature_fuel = m_p->TemperatureFuel; 00048 00049 G4double massUO2 = 0.313; 00050 G4double massAl = 0.687; 00051 G4double X_vol_Al = 0.888; 00052 G4double massU235pc = 19.75; 00053 G4double massU238pc = 80.25; 00054 00056 // Water 00058 00059 G4Material* g4_h2o = G4NistManager::Instance()->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_WATER"); 00060 m_WaterMaterial = new TMXMaterial("FUEL_WATER", g4_h2o->GetDensity(), 1, kStateLiquid, temperature_fuel); 00061 m_WaterMaterial->AddMaterial(g4_h2o, 1); 00062 00064 // CLAD Aluminium material; target material 00066 00067 G4Element* elAl_metal = new G4Element("TS_Aluminium_Metal", "al_metal", 13., 26.981539 * g / mole); 00068 G4Material* m_CladMaterial_t = new G4Material("FUEL_CLAD", G4NistManager::Instance()->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_Al")->GetDensity(), 1, kStateSolid, temperature_fuel); 00069 m_CladMaterial_t->AddElement(elAl_metal, 1); 00070 m_CladMaterial = new TMXMaterial("FUEL_CLAD", G4NistManager::Instance()->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_Al")->GetDensity(), 1, kStateSolid, temperature_fuel); 00071 m_CladMaterial->AddMaterial(m_CladMaterial_t, 1); 00072 00074 // ABSOR: B4C 00076 00077 G4Material* g4_b4c = G4NistManager::Instance()->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_BORON_CARBIDE"); 00078 m_AbsorMaterial = new TMXMaterial("FUEL_ABSOR", g4_b4c->GetDensity(), 1, kStateSolid, temperature_fuel); 00079 m_AbsorMaterial->AddMaterial(g4_b4c, 1); 00080 00082 // FUEL: UO2 (19.75% U-235) + Al matrix 00084 00085 G4NistManager* manager = G4NistManager::Instance(); 00086 00087 // Elements // 00088 G4Isotope* U5 = new G4Isotope("U235", 92, 235, manager->GetIsotopeMass(92,235)); 00089 G4Isotope* U8 = new G4Isotope("U238", 92, 238, manager->GetIsotopeMass(92,238)); 00090 00091 G4Element* elU235_238 = new G4Element("TS_U_of_Uranium_Dioxide", "u_uo2", 2); 00092 elU235_238->AddIsotope(U5, massU235pc * perCent); // in % 19.75 was discussed, ~3.5-4.5 for H2O reactors 00093 elU235_238->AddIsotope(U8, massU238pc * perCent); // in % ! 00094 00095 G4Element* elO_uo2 = new G4Element("TS_O_of_Uranium_Dioxide" ,"o_uo2" , 8., 16.00 * g/mole); 00096 00097 // Materials // 00098 G4double denUO2 = 9.8 * CLHEP::g / CLHEP::cm3; 00099 G4Material* uo2 = new TMXMaterial("uo2", denUO2, 2, kStateSolid, temperature_fuel); 00100 uo2->AddElement(elU235_238, 1); 00101 uo2->AddElement(elO_uo2, 2); 00102 00103 G4double denUO2Al = X_vol_Al * G4NistManager::Instance()->FindOrBuildMaterial("G4_Al")->GetDensity() + (1-X_vol_Al) * denUO2; 00104 m_FuelMaterial = new TMXMaterial("fuel_UO2Al", denUO2Al, 2, kStateSolid, temperature_fuel); 00105 m_FuelMaterial->AddMaterial(m_CladMaterial, massAl /(massAl + massUO2)); 00106 m_FuelMaterial->AddMaterial(uo2, massUO2 /(massAl + massUO2)); 00107 } 00108 00109 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------*------------------------------------------------------------------------------// 00110 // Construction of the logical volumes for cladding, Fuel and water in the active area 00111 // IRT-4M-8T fuel assembly 00112 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------*------------------------------------------------------------------------------// 00113 // Sources 00114 // https://www.ipen.br/biblioteca/slr/cel/0059 00115 // https://www.researchgate.net/publication/263485134_Thermal_hydraulic_calculations_of_the_IRT-Sofia_research_reactor_with_leu_fuel_IRT-4M_Sofia 00116 // https://www.researchgate.net/publication/238658698_A_neutronic_feasibility_study_for_LEU_conversion_of_the_IR8_research_reactor/figures?lo=1 00117 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------*------------------------------------------------------------------------------// 00118 void TMXFuelIRT4M8T::createGeometry() 00119 { 00120 // Dimensions of the fuel assemblies 00121 G4double assembly_Thickness = 69.6 * mm; 00122 G4double step_btw_Clad = 6.9 * mm; 00123 G4double h_Fuel = 600 * mm; 00124 G4double fuel_Thickness = 0.7 * mm; 00125 G4double clad_thickness = 1.6 * mm; 00126 G4int nb_plate = 7; 00127 G4double tubeOutDiameter = 21.3 * mm; 00128 G4double tubeIntDiameter = 18.1 * mm; 00129 G4double tubeDisplOutDiam = 14 * mm; 00130 G4double tubeDisplIntDiam = 12 * mm; 00131 00132 //See if there is a way to remove it//////////// 00133 std::vector<G4LogicalVolume*> fLogicCladInt8T;// 00135 G4bool overlap = false; 00136 if(m_p->Verbose == 1) 00137 overlap = true; 00138 00139 G4Box* sMaster = new G4Box("sMaster", 00140 assembly_Thickness / 2, assembly_Thickness / 2, h_Fuel / 2 ); 00141 m_Solids.push_back(sMaster); 00142 m_masterVolume = new G4LogicalVolume( sMaster, // its solid 00143 m_WaterMaterial, // its material 00144 "lMaster" ); // its name 00145 m_waterLogicalVolumes.push_back(m_masterVolume); 00146 00147 // From external to internal physical volumes 00148 for(int i = 0; i < nb_plate ; i++) 00149 { 00150 G4Box * sCLADOut = new G4Box("sCLADOut_" + std::to_string(i), 00151 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad ) / 2, 00152 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad ) / 2, 00153 h_Fuel / 2); 00154 m_Solids.push_back(sCLADOut); 00155 G4LogicalVolume * lCLADOut = new G4LogicalVolume( sCLADOut, // its solid 00156 m_CladMaterial, // its material 00157 "lCLADOut_" + std::to_string(i) ); // its name 00158 m_cladLogicalVolumes.push_back(lCLADOut); 00159 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00160 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00161 lCLADOut, // its logical volume 00162 "CLADOut_" + std::to_string(i), // its name 00163 (i == 0) ? m_masterVolume : fLogicCladInt8T[i-1], // its mother volume 00164 false, // no boolean operation 00165 0, // copy number 00166 overlap); // overlaps checking 00167 00168 00169 00170 G4Box * sFUEL = new G4Box("sFUEL" + std::to_string(i), 00171 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad - ( clad_thickness - fuel_Thickness ) ) / 2, 00172 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad - ( clad_thickness - fuel_Thickness ) ) / 2, 00173 h_Fuel / 2); 00174 m_Solids.push_back(sFUEL); 00175 G4LogicalVolume * lFUEL = new G4LogicalVolume( sFUEL, // its solid 00176 m_FuelMaterial, // its material 00177 "lFUEL_" + std::to_string(i) ); // its name 00178 m_fuelLogicalVolumes.push_back(lFUEL); 00179 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00180 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00181 lFUEL, // its logical volume 00182 "FUEL_" + std::to_string(i), // its name 00183 lCLADOut, // its mother volume 00184 false, // no boolean operation 00185 0, // copy number 00186 overlap); // overlaps checking 00187 00188 00189 00190 G4Box * sCLADInt = new G4Box("sCLADInt_" + std::to_string(i), 00191 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad - ( clad_thickness + fuel_Thickness ) ) / 2, 00192 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad - ( clad_thickness + fuel_Thickness ) ) / 2, 00193 h_Fuel / 2); 00194 m_Solids.push_back(sCLADInt); 00195 G4LogicalVolume * lCLADInt = new G4LogicalVolume( sCLADInt, // its solid 00196 m_CladMaterial, // its material 00197 "lCLADInt_" + std::to_string(i) ); // its name 00198 m_cladLogicalVolumes.push_back(lCLADInt); 00199 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00200 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00201 lCLADInt, // its logical volume 00202 "CLADInt_" + std::to_string(i), // its name 00203 lFUEL, // its mother volume 00204 false, // no boolean operation 00205 0, // copy number 00206 overlap); // overlaps checking 00207 00208 00209 00210 G4Box * sWATER = new G4Box("sWATER_" + std::to_string(i), 00211 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad ) / 2 - clad_thickness, 00212 ( assembly_Thickness - i * step_btw_Clad ) / 2 - clad_thickness, 00213 h_Fuel / 2); 00214 m_Solids.push_back(sWATER); 00215 G4LogicalVolume * lWATER = new G4LogicalVolume( sWATER, // its solid 00216 m_WaterMaterial, // its material 00217 "lWATER_" + std::to_string(i) ); 00218 m_waterLogicalVolumes.push_back(lWATER); 00219 fLogicCladInt8T.push_back( lWATER ); // its name 00220 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00221 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00222 lWATER, // its logical volume 00223 "WATER_" + std::to_string(i), // its name 00224 lCLADInt, // its mother volume 00225 false, // no boolean operation 00226 0, // copy number 00227 overlap); // overlaps checking 00228 00229 } 00230 G4Tubs* sCLADTube = new G4Tubs("sCLADTube", 00231 tubeIntDiameter / 2, tubeOutDiameter / 2, 00232 h_Fuel / 2, 0., 00233 twopi ); 00234 m_Solids.push_back(sCLADTube); 00235 G4LogicalVolume * lCLADTube = new G4LogicalVolume( sCLADTube, // its solid 00236 m_CladMaterial, // its material 00237 "lCLADTube" ); // its name 00238 m_cladLogicalVolumes.push_back(lCLADTube); 00239 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00240 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00241 lCLADTube, // its logical volume 00242 "CLADTube" , // its name 00243 fLogicCladInt8T[nb_plate-1], // its mother volume 00244 false, // no boolean operation 00245 0, // copy number 00246 overlap); // overlaps checking 00247 00248 00249 00250 G4Tubs* sFUELTube = new G4Tubs("sFUELTube", 00251 tubeIntDiameter / 2 + ((tubeOutDiameter - tubeIntDiameter) / 2 - fuel_Thickness ) / 2, 00252 tubeIntDiameter / 2 + ((tubeOutDiameter - tubeIntDiameter) / 2 + fuel_Thickness ) / 2, 00253 h_Fuel / 2, 0., twopi ); 00254 m_Solids.push_back(sFUELTube); 00255 G4LogicalVolume * lFUELTube = new G4LogicalVolume( sFUELTube, // its solid 00256 m_FuelMaterial, // its material 00257 "lFUELTube" ); // its name 00258 m_fuelLogicalVolumes.push_back(lFUELTube); 00259 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00260 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00261 lFUELTube, // its logical volume 00262 "FUELTube" , // its name 00263 lFUELTube, // its mother volume 00264 false, // no boolean operation 00265 0, // copy number 00266 overlap); // overlaps checking 00267 00268 G4Tubs* sCLADTubeDispl = new G4Tubs("sCLADTubeDispl", 00269 tubeDisplIntDiam / 2, tubeDisplOutDiam / 2, 00270 h_Fuel / 2, 0., 00271 twopi ); 00272 m_Solids.push_back(sCLADTubeDispl); 00273 G4LogicalVolume * lCLADTubeDispl = new G4LogicalVolume( sCLADTubeDispl, // its solid 00274 m_CladMaterial, // its material 00275 "lCLADTubeDispl" ); // its name 00276 m_cladLogicalVolumes.push_back(lCLADTubeDispl); 00277 new G4PVPlacement( 0, // no rotation 00278 G4ThreeVector(), // at (0,0,0) 00279 lCLADTubeDispl, // its logical volume 00280 "CLADTubeDispl" , // its name 00281 fLogicCladInt8T[nb_plate-1], // its mother volume 00282 false, // no boolean operation 00283 0, // copy number 00284 overlap); // overlaps checking 00285 }
